clueGame

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • clueGame.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object

    Card

    This class stores the information for a single card, which can be a person, weapon, or room.
    Since:
    2017-11-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adam Nelson, Youjun Lee
